reviewText: This is excellent, the stories behind On Any Sunday.

What you would expect from Bruce Brown. If you liked his Endless Summer and On Any Sunday movies, then you will like this set. I enjoy the history of off-roading in the west. Grew up in the Southern California desert around desert racing in the 1960-1970 era and these videos bring back plenty of memories of those times.

If you are a Bruce Brown fan, you will enjoy this box set.  It doesn't have the same feel as the old school Bruce Brown films, but they were certainly enjoyable to watch even still.  You can't beat the vintage footage.
Have purchased for my husband all of the Bruce Brown DVD's and  he loves them all.
If you have never watched a movie by Bruce brown (On any Sunday and Endless Summer) For Starters you have missed out they are timless
Bruce Brown movies make motorcycling what it is suppose to be, fun, and his movies project that. If you like off roading and don't what this three movies, you're missing a lot.
If you want to relive the old days or are curious about the heyday of desert riding, you will thoroughly enjoy these disks.
not as good as i thought but still nice to have in my collection
